name: SPEC_DIRECTED_MARKING
description: This table stores how the site was marked with the suture.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DIRECTED_MARKING_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for how the site was marked with the suture (direction oriented).
entries: Long suture lateral, short suture cranial, 4 very short sutures lateral/clips deep
Long suture lateral, short suture cranial, 4 very short deep, 4 clips superficially
Different marking (write in the comment field)
